name: The Corrupted Warden
strategy: Focus on clearing minions first to reduce chaos. During the charge attack, move perpendicular to the boss. In the enraged phase, stay mobile and prioritize dodging over attacking. The ground pound is telegraphed - jump or move away when you see the windup.

name: Spectral Twins
strategy: Keep both twins on screen to predict their synchronized attacks. When one dies, the remaining twin becomes faster but more predictable. The laser beams can be dodged by staying between the twins. Save your active items for the single-twin phase.

name: The Flame Colossus
strategy: The floor is as dangerous as the boss - avoid lava pools at all costs. During the floating phase, focus on dodging meteors while getting shots in. In the final melee phase, keep your distance and kite around the room. Fire resistance items trivialize this fight.

name: The Void Serpent
patterns: Tunnel under and emerge near player
strategy: Watch for ground ripples to predict where it will emerge. Avoid the center of the room during the tail whip. The poison clouds linger, so keep moving to maintain safe space. High mobility and flight are extremely valuable here.

name: The Clockwork Horror
strategy: Deal damage quickly to prevent healing. The time-slow field affects you but not projectiles - stay out of it. During overclock, the boss is faster but more vulnerable. In breakdown phase, exploit the slower attack speed for maximum damage.

name: The Crystal Monarch
strategy: Focus on breaking shield crystals to expose the core. Ignore minions unless overwhelmed. The laser beam follows you - circle strafe to avoid it. During the finale, focus purely on dodging and get shots in between attacks. This is a marathon, not a sprint.

name: The Shadow Assassin
strategy: Listen for audio cues during invisibility. When visible, burst damage quickly before it vanishes. Shadow clones have lower health - clear them fast. Keep moving to avoid backstabs. Items that reveal enemies make this fight much easier.

name: The Ancient Guardian
strategy: Avoid the gaze cone or you'll be slowed significantly. Use pillars as cover but be ready to move when they start glowing. The earthquake makes dodging harder - prioritize positioning. In decay phase, chunks fall off revealing weak points.

name: The Plague Doctor
strategy: Kill infected minions before they explode. The plague gas lingers - control where it spawns. Dodge the syringe dash sideways. This fight is about area control and positioning. Poison immunity is incredibly strong here.

name: The Thunder Tyrant
strategy: The lightning telegraphs where it will strike - watch for glowing circles. Electric fields limit movement - clear them quickly. During airborne phase, the boss is immune but vulnerable after landing. In storm rage, focus on survival and get damage when safe.

name: The Frozen King
strategy: Fire damage breaks ice armor faster. The freeze beam slows you progressively - don't let it hit multiple times. Keep moving to avoid ice spikes. In shattered phase, the boss moves faster but takes more damage. The blizzard limits visibility - memorize safe zones.

name: The Flesh Amalgam
strategy: Destroy all body parts to expose the core. Detached parts act independently - manage them carefully. During regeneration, deal damage quickly to interrupt. The flesh walls block movement but can be destroyed. High tear rate is crucial here.

name: The Celestial Judge
strategy: A test of skill and patience. The holy beams can be dodged but require precise movement. Shields must be broken before damaging the boss. Angels heal the judge - prioritize them. The judgment explosion is survivable with good positioning or defensive items.

name: The Chaos Entity
strategy: There is no set strategy - adaptability is key. Learn to recognize attack telegraphs quickly. Status effect immunity helps but isn't necessary. Stay calm and focused despite the chaos. This boss tests everything you've learned. Strong runs have a significant advantage.

name: The Final Adversary
strategy: This is it - the ultimate challenge. Every skill matters. Prioritize survival over damage. Learn the phase transitions. Use your active items wisely. Strong defensive items are crucial. The fight is long - pace yourself. Pattern recognition is everything. Don't give up - victory is possible!
